mapper.select: select * from board order by num desc limit #{row}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into board (subject, content, writedate, filenum, writer) values (#{subject}, #{content}, curdate(), #{filenum}, #{writer})
insert into file (directory, name, size, contenttype, uploaddate) values (#{directory}, #{name}, #{size}, #{contenttype}, CURDATE())
mapper.update: update board set viewcount = viewcount+1 where num=#{num}
